title: Travel-Board
text: An easy to use, mobile first web application for browsing popular travel destinations finding places of interest, and organizing your travel plans.

title: Weather Dashboard
text: A weather dashboard that displays weather data via third party API.

title: Code Quiz
text: A project that uses javascript to dynamically generate quiz questions. Saves high scores to local storage.

title: Password Generator
text: A project that uses JavaScript to generate a random password.

title: Team Profile Generator
text: A CLI application that uses a Node CLI that takes in information about employees and generates an HTML webpage that displays summaries for each person.

title: Employee Tracker
text: A node application that interfaces with a MySql database to manage employee data.
